| History                 = The Sanguino Family was one of the five families that ruled the underworld in [[New York City]] through their [[Tri-State Crime Syndicate (Earth-616)|Tri-State Syndicate]]. It's stronghold was in the state of [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]]. It controlled the Teamsters and through them the truckers in NY City, and they also dominated the drug trade in the city.{{r|Kingpin Vol 2 1|7}}
